scripts.predev: npm run copy-docs && npm run copy-transclusions && npm run copy-assets
scripts.prebuild: npm run copy-docs && npm run copy-transclusions && npm run copy-assets
scripts._copy-docs-html: . .env && rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-html     && mkdir -p src/pages/uxp/reference-html     && cp -r "$UXP_REPO_SOURCE"/uxp/reference-html   src/pages/uxp/ && mv src/pages/uxp/reference-html/reference-html.js reference-html.js
scripts._copy-docs-spectrum: . .env && rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-spectrum && mkdir -p src/pages/uxp/reference-spectrum && cp -r "$UXP_REPO_SOURCE"/uxp/reference-spectrum src/pages/uxp/ && mv src/pages/uxp/reference-spectrum/reference-spectrum.js reference-spectrum.js
scripts._copy-docs-css: . .env && rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-css      && mkdir -p src/pages/uxp/reference-css      && cp -r "$UXP_REPO_SOURCE"/uxp/reference-css      src/pages/uxp/ && mv src/pages/uxp/reference-css/reference-css.js reference-css.js
scripts._copy-docs-js: . .env && rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-js       && mkdir -p src/pages/uxp/reference-js       && cp -r "$UXP_REPO_SOURCE"/uxp/reference-js       src/pages/uxp/ && mv src/pages/uxp/reference-js/reference-js.js reference-js.js
scripts.copy-docs: npm run _copy-docs-js && npm run _copy-docs-css && npm run _copy-docs-html && npm run _copy-docs-spectrum
scripts.copy-assets: npm run _copy-spectrum-assets && npm run _copy-spectrum-assets-transclusions && npm run _copy-html-assets && npm run _copy-html-assets-transclusions
scripts.experiment: npm run copy-docs-new && npm run copy-assets-new
scripts._copy-docs-html-new: . .env && rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-html     && mkdir -p src/pages/uxp/reference-html     && cp -r "$UXP_REPO_SOURCE"/HTML/ src/pages/uxp/reference-html/
scripts._copy-docs-spectrum-new: . .env && rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-spectrum && mkdir -p src/pages/uxp/reference-spectrum && cp -r "$UXP_REPO_SOURCE"/spectrum/ src/pages/uxp/reference-spectrum/
scripts._copy-docs-css-new: . .env && rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-css      && mkdir -p src/pages/uxp/reference-css      && cp -r "$UXP_REPO_SOURCE"/CSS/ src/pages/uxp/reference-css/
scripts._copy-docs-js-new: . .env && rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-js       && mkdir -p src/pages/uxp/reference-js       && cp -r "$UXP_REPO_SOURCE"/JS/ src/pages/uxp/reference-js/
scripts.copy-docs-new: npm run _copy-docs-js-new && npm run _copy-docs-css-new && npm run _copy-docs-html-new && npm run _copy-docs-spectrum-new
